Preprocess

scripts.preprocess.init_query_and_qrel(query_path, qrel_path, cache_dir, max_length, tokenizer, tokenizer_type, preprocess_threads, text_type)

tokenize query file and transfer passage/document/query id in qrel file to its index in the saved token-ids matrix

Parameters

  • query_path – query file path

  • qrel_path – qrel file path

  • cache_dir –

  • max_length –

  • remove_absent_query – if True, queries that didn’t appear in the qrels file will be removed from the input query file

scripts.preprocess.init_text(text_path, cache_dir, max_length, tokenizer, tokenizer_type, preprocess_threads, text_type=None)

tokenize the passage/document text in multiple threads

Parameters

  • text_path – query/passage/document file path

  • cache_dir – save the output token ids etc.

  • max_length – maximum token length of the text

Returns

map the id to the index in the saved token-id matrix

Return type

id2index

scripts.preprocess._tokenize_text(input_path, output_dir, all_line_count, start_idx, end_idx, tokenizer, max_length, text_type)

tokenize the input text, do padding and truncation, then save the token ids, token_lengths, text ids

Parameters

  • input_path – input text file path

  • output_dir – directory of output numpy arrays

  • start_idx – the begining index to read

  • end_idx – the ending index

  • tokenizer – transformer tokenizer

  • max_length – max length of tokens

  • text_type – corpus class
